001package zemeckis;
002
003import javax.annotation.Nonnull;
004
005/**
006 * Interface defining handler invoked when an unexpected error occurs.
007 */
008@FunctionalInterface
009public interface UncaughtErrorHandler
010{
011  /**
012   * Callback invoked when an unexpected error occurs.
013   *
014   * @param error the exception.
015   */
016  void onUncaughtError( @Nonnull Throwable error );
017}
